text: Get up and take a short walk every hour.
Work in a standing position today.
Sleep one hour earlier than usual today.
Call a friend you haven't spoken for some time.
Buy flowers for your significant other.
Invite a friend over to your place.
Sit down and concentrate on your breath for 10 minutes.
Read a book for 30 minutes before sleeping.
Shut off your phone for one hour.
Take notes for 30 seconds after each meeting.
Volunteer for cleaning the dishes in the office.
Open Wikipedia and read a random article.
Draw the view from your window with pencil and paper.
